text: The new Italian Hero Pizza was amazing! A 6 topping pizza for $10, you cant beat that. And we supersizes it for only $2 more! Tasted like it came from a local pizzeria.  Amazing!

name: j k
text: It has been a while since I have ordered a pizza from papa johns but I thought I would give it a shot.  I ordered a buffalo chicken pizzza but got a ranch pizza drizzled with a tiny bit of buffalo sauce and almost no chicken.  Ranch is gross.  Add chicken and buffalo sauce and you might have a winner.  I will try again in 5 years.
